title: Stressor
description: Events that occur within the victim organization and precipitate insider activity.

id.description: A unique string that begins with "stressor--" and is appended with a UUIDv4.

date.description: The date the stressor first occurred.

category.description: The category to which the stressor belongs.

subcategory.description: The subcategory to which the stressor belongs. When subcategory is specified, category MUST also be specified. The subcategory constant MUST map to the specified category constant.

oneOf.title: Employment Status
oneOf.description: The insider's employment status changed.

oneOf.title: Organizational Issues
oneOf.description: The insider's employer had problems or changes that directly or indirectly affected the insider.

oneOf.title: Unmet Expectations
oneOf.description: Insider's expectations of/from their employer were not met.

oneOf.title: Consequences for Previous Violations
oneOf.description: Consequences resulting from the insider's previous behavior or violations, not resulting from the incident itself.

oneOf.title: Insider Hired
oneOf.description: Insider is hired by the victim organization or another organization.

oneOf.title: Insider Promoted
oneOf.description: The insider is promoted within any organization, including the victim organization.

oneOf.title: Insider Demoted
oneOf.description: The insider is demoted within any organization, including the victim organization.

oneOf.title: Insider Notified of Pending Termination
oneOf.description: The insider is informed that they will be terminated from the organization in the near future.

oneOf.title: Insider Suspended
oneOf.description: The insider is suspended from work for any reason.

oneOf.title: Insider Laid Off
oneOf.description: The insider is laid off from their position within the organization.

oneOf.title: Insider Put on Paid/Unpaid Leave
oneOf.description: The insider is put on a temporary leave from a job assignment, with or without pay and benefits.

oneOf.title: Insider Terminated
oneOf.description: The insider is fired from any organization, including the victim organization

oneOf.title: Insider Resigned
oneOf.description: The insider resigns from any organization, including the victim organization.

oneOf.title: Change of Employment Status
oneOf.description: The insider's status within the organization being changes from what it originally was (e.g., Insider took a full-time position at the organization after graduating college).

oneOf.title: Insider Changed Positions Internally
oneOf.description: The insider changes positions within the organization (e.g., Insider transferred to the Accounting department).

oneOf.title: Insider Submits Resignation Notice
oneOf.description: The insider submits notice of resignation to the organization.

oneOf.title: Mergers And Acquisitions
oneOf.description: A change in the structure of the insider's employer organization (e.g., The insider's organization was in the process of being bought out by another company).

oneOf.title: Reorganization Of Organization Or Outsourcing
oneOf.description: A change in the internal structure of the insider's employer (e.g., The division of the victim organization that the insider worked in was closing).

oneOf.title: Significant Financial Stress (non-bankruptcy)
oneOf.description: The organization was undergoing significant financial stress, but did not declare bankruptcy.

oneOf.title: Previous Insider Incident
oneOf.description: Organization has previously had an insider incident unrelated to this one

oneOf.title: Layoffs
oneOf.description: Temporary suspension or permanent termination of one or more employees.

oneOf.title: Personnel Changes
oneOf.description: Staffing changes of employees other than the insider within the employing organization.

oneOf.title: Supervisor Ambiguity
oneOf.description: The insider expressed a lack of clarity in the organization's supervisory hierarchy.

oneOf.title: Organization Filed for Bankruptcy
oneOf.description: The organization filed for bankruptcy.

oneOf.title: Lack of Background Checks
oneOf.description: The organizational failure to sufficiently review the past history of potential candidates.

oneOf.title: Inadequate Training
oneOf.description: An organizational failure to administer the proper training for its employees.

oneOf.title: Lax Controls
oneOf.description: The organizational failure to restrict access to what is necessary for the insider to perform work related activities.

oneOf.title: Hostile Work Environment
oneOf.description: A work environment that is difficult or uncomfortable for another person to work in due to discrimination of any kind.

oneOf.title: Problematic Leader
oneOf.description: A supervisor or other leader who is abusive or difficult to work with, for example, by ignoring input from subordinates, excessively criticizing, or taking credit for subordinates' work.

oneOf.title: Compensation/Benefit Issues
oneOf.description: Insider expressed dissatisfaction with current compensation or benefits.

oneOf.title: Poor Performance Review
oneOf.description: Insider received a review of their work performance, which is deemed below average.

oneOf.title: Request Denied By Organization
oneOf.description: The employing organization refused a request from the insider (e.g., The insider's request to work from home is denied due to unproductivity in past work from home).

oneOf.title: Passed Over For Promotion
oneOf.description: Insider's employer chooses to promote someone other than the insider.

oneOf.title: Counseling
oneOf.description: Insider was sent to counseling of any kind as a result of their actions

oneOf.title: Referred to EAP
oneOf.description: Insider was referred to the Employee Assistance Program (EAP) as a result of their actions

oneOf.title: Reported to HR
oneOf.description: Insider was reported to Human Resources as a result of their actions

oneOf.title: Transferred
oneOf.description: Insider was transferred to another location or another team as a result of their actions.

oneOf.title: Verbal Reprimand
oneOf.description: Insider received a verbal reprimand from their supervisor as a result of their actions.

oneOf.title: Written Reprimand
oneOf.description: Insider received a written reprimand from their supervisor as a result of their actions.
